title.text: Reconciliation of Unsupervised Clustering, Segmentation and Cohesion

abstractContent.text: This extended abstract examines the progress of a project on unsupervised language learning, and focuses on two different approaches to segmentation, as well as how cohesion maybe generalized from it definitive morpho-syntactic instantiation.
It is intended as a discussion paper, and outlines the specific hypotheses currenlty being tested.
